name: SP1
comment: value and sensorstate of upper tank temperature sensor SP1

name: SP2
comment: value and sensorstate of lower tank temperature sensor SP2

name: D1Temp
comment: value and sensorstate of middle tank temperature sensor TD1

name: SolarGain
comment: value and sensorstate of the solar gain sensor

name: Col
comment: value and sensorstate of the collector sensor

name: CollPump
comment: collector pump's state

name: SolarCollPumpDcIntegrator
comment: integral part of the solar collector pump's control if duty ratio control is active

name: TempDifferenceOn
comment: solar difference control's switch on temperature

name: TempDifferenceOff
comment: solar difference control's switch off temperature

name: MaximalTemp
comment: Maximale Speichertemperatur für Solarladung

name: SolarCollPumpED
comment: percentage of 'pump is on' during one minute (if duty ratio control is enabled)

name: RuntimeCollPump
comment: accumulated runtime of the collector pump

name: FlowRate
comment: chosen flow rate of the collector pump (to calculate solar gain)

name: ScProtectionLimit
comment: Switch off temperature for collector protection

name: ScProtectionHysteresis
comment: temperature hysteresis for activating solar pump after collector protection

name: KickFunction
comment: enable kick function

name: SumSolarGain
comment: accumulated solar gain

name: EDFunction
comment: enable duty ratio control

name: ResetSolarGain
comment: reset solar gain

name: SolarOperationMode
comment: Betriebsart des Solarkreises

name: ColKickPumpTime
comment: time pump is running when collector kick function is activated

name: ColKickTempDelta
comment: temperature difference necessary for activating the pump kick

name: ProtectionLimitOffTime
comment: time for which KOL temperature has to exceed the protection temperature to enter solar circuit protection mode

name: SumSolarGainDayBefore
comment: sum of yesterday's solar gain

name: EnableScProtection
comment: enable solar circuit protection

name: FrostProtectionEnabled
comment: set TRUE to enable solar frost protection

name: FrostProtectionLimit
comment: temperature level for activating solar frost protection

name: D2Temp
comment: value and sensorstate of the system's return flow sensor TD2

name: PumpAntiLockingFlags
comment: each set bit represents a pump that has not run in the last 24h

name: MultifunctionOutput
comment: Output of multifunction relay

name: Time
comment: Aktuelle Uhrzeit

name: Date
comment: Aktuelles Datum

name: Weekday
comment: Aktueller Wochentag

name: InitCircuit
comment: true if DHW and CP circuits are in init phase

name: MAPreferredStorage
comment: 1 <=> preferred storage is storage with SP1/SP2 sensors, 2 <=> preferred storage is storage with SP3/TD1 sensors

name: OMultifunction
comment: multifunction relay: 0 = 2nd storage, 1 = differential control

name: SystemMode
comment: 0 = heatpump; 1 = 430 system, must be cyclicly written by the CI

name: TempDifferenceOnTD12
comment: temperature difference for the multifunction-output relay to switch on

name: TempDifferenceOffTD12
comment: temperature difference for the multifunction-output relay to switch off

name: QuickVetoStart
comment: Signal for starting quick veto (will be reset after quick veto has been started)

name: IsInHolidayMode
comment: holiday mode

name: LpZpMaPort
comment: multifunction-output port replay

name: Hc1PumpKol1PP1Port
comment: collector 1 pump port replay

name: Hc2aLegPumpP2Port
comment: legionella pump port replay

name: Hc2zPort
comment: Port replay
